title: Second Language Online Learning Design: A Case-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online educational tools, foundational understanding of second language teaching theories
context.additional_context: Training pre-service teachers to design online second-language math-integrated lessons in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 12 core elements of second-language online learning design by analyzing case studies.
Learners can design effective learning activities under smartphone environmental constraints based on observation-based feedback.
Learners critically analyze peer teachers' design proposals and suggest improvements through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
